      • isStatic

        public static boolean isStatic(Selection sel)

        Returns true if the given selection is independent of a query. It might not be constant, as a positional parameter might be dependent of an input parameter.

        Parameters:
        sel - The selection to test
        Returns:
        Returns true if query-independent

      • convert

        public static Query convert(Selection sel)

        Converts a notational query in form of a selection into an actual KB based query.

        Parameters:
        sel - The selection to convert
        Returns:
        Returns the query
